Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: We celebrated a party there. The service was wonderful. Very friendly. Really good music and nice local food. There's an awesome playground there for the children, which is perfect if you have kids

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Perfect location! Good food: higher quality for what you pay for. Great concept to share with your friends. Good beers. And last but not least: a large playground so the kids can enjoy themselves and the parents too.

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text:
This place must be amazing in summer, today (March) we didn't get to enjoy the roof terrace or outdoor tables.
We did get to enjow the food! Quality as well as presentation of the food is ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: How do you describe home in a way that only has the good feelings and connections and well... to be honest.. better food than you can remember. ..? ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: I tried to order a french fries. I asked if they have any snack or french fries and the man told me they don't have any food. I was with 2 children, so I had to find another place. But when we came back I saw some people there were eating french fries.  I'm disappointed. Why I was denied service?!

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Place to be in Amsterdam! Great ambiance, amazing staff, good service, beautiful rooftop and really cool playground for kids! I say cheers to this gem in the city!

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Dogs not allowed. Dislike

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Relaxed and good if you have kids as is between playground (age 3+ better) . Had one of the best toasties in town.

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Great place to relax whilst the children play. Great coffee and tasty bites.

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Nice simple place in the center of the square where parents have coffee while their children play

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: Awesome place. Knows exactly how to keep kids and parents happy.

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: One of the best spots in Amsterdam, fantastic food, great value and lovely atmosphere.

Review Text: Great to sit back enjoy a coffee and watch the kids go crazy

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Wonderful place where you can quietly enjoy the large square. I'll be back soon to take a seat on the roof terrace :) ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super nice place for a snack or a drink. Or to meet up. You can rent the rooftop for parties and celebrations. Friendly staff and reasonable prices. ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Nice place on the square. Large terrace and also beautiful roof terrace. It is suitable for a cup of coffee or a drink. But you can also have a nice meal or a good party there! ‚Ä¶

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text:
(Translated by Google) I recently celebrated my 60th birthday here on the roof terrace with delicious tapas and a hot buffet. What a gem in our neighborhood.

Name: Het Paviljoen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) At the pavaljoen you are well looked after: lovely staff, good food and a very relaxed atmosphere. And if you have something to celebrate, they will make sure you have an unforgettable evening at the pavaljoen. ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) a super nice and nice restaurant. very nice to eat with a large group and also very nice to go with children since there is a very large play complex around it. the burgers are too tasty and the tapas are delicious ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Had a nice Sunday afternoon with our cousin Michel and family. Delicious snacks and a good glass of wine. See you soon. ‚Ä¶
